en.2021_july_filter_and_selection_usability: We know surface already select items at the top of the list for assignees and filters, and custom fields selections are now ordered by usage across our entire user base
en.2021_july_social_proof_on_signup_page_de: We now showcase the total number of registered companies on the Sign Up and Sign In pages!
en.2021_july_people_page_real_time_improvem: No our people page updates in real-time for role changes, new invites, and users who accept invites
en.2021_july_deleted_records_logs_descripti: We now keep a log on project activities of all delete Records
en.2021_july_all_users_can_see_project_deta: All Users Can See Project Details
We now show the project description to all users, not just administrators
en.2021_june_file_upload_for_forms_descript: Forms now support the custom field for file uploads, which means you can use forms for things like CV uploads, projects briefs, and more
en.2021_june_project_folders_description: Group your projects in the sidebar with color-coded folders for better organization. Perfect when you have dozens of projects on the go
en.2021_june_change_email_description: It's been more than 3 years, but now you can finally change your email without asking us to do it for you! ;)
en.2021_june_birthday_tracking_description: You can add your birthday in your profile, and we will remind the company owner to buy you a present ;)
en.2021_june_german_language_description: Hallo! German language is now available in our Beta app across the world. Danke!
en.2021_may_custom_field_for_files_descript: You can now create custom fields that support adding multiple files at the same time. This is great for creating a more structured process for uploading documents and feedback
en.2021_may_improved_tags_description: We've increased the number of tag colors from 16 to 20 and improved the color palette to be easier on the eyes
en.2021_may_api_description: Every single action that you can do in Blue is available via our API. This is a beta feature so its not yet recommended for mission-critical processes
en.2021_april_spanish_language_description: Hola! Spanish language is now available! We've got a few more languages coming soon
en.2021_april_new_currencies_description: We have added support for new currencies including the British pound, Philippine Peso, Ethereum and Bitcoin
en.2021_april_files_in_mobile_apps_descript: Our mobile apps now support browsing and previewing through all the files in your projects
en.2021_march_project_templates_description: Take process to the next level by creating your own templates! These will be available to all your team members, so you can keep work consistent and save time
en.2021_march_duplicate_projects_descriptio: You can now copy an entire project in a few clicks. Copy the entire thing, or pick and choose what you want to copy across
en.2021_march_automation_notifications_desc: Now you can receive notifications each time something happens via an automation. This is a great way to stay up to date with what's happening
en.2021_february_forms_description: You can now create multiple forms for each project, and pick and choose which custom fields to enable to build your perfect forms. Share these outside of Blue and watch the entries automatically become Records in your projects
en.2021_february_my_records_v2_description: Now your Records are automatically categorized by what's coming up soon and what's late, helping you keep track of what you have to get done
en.2021_february_searchable_tags_descriptio: Now you can easily search for tags when tagging Records, perfect for projects where you have lots and lots of tags
en.2021_february_updated_client_permissions: Clients can no longer delete other people's Records in projects or create new lists in projects
en.2021_february_timezone_aware_description: Blue now automatically detects your timezone and ensures reminders are sent at the right time
en.2021_january_location_custom_field_descr: You can now add multiple location custom fields to a Record. You can search for a place, drag and drop a pin on a map, or just enter the coordinates if you have them in hand
en.2021_january_map_view_description: If you're using the location custom field, you can now switch views and see all your Records in a map. This is great to view customer addresses, location of equipment, and more!
en.2021_january_new_currencies_description: Due to lots of requests, we've added a whole bunch of new currencies that are now supported by our custom fields. Hello to Brazil, India, Korean, and a few other countries! :)
en.2021_january_import_export_v2_descriptio: We've added custom field management including in that we also added new fields; currency, selection, and tag for a faster mapping process! Additionally, the ability to auto-assign headers based on the column names making it easier for you!
en.2020_december_import_export_records_desc: Import and export Records via CSV files. This works with all custom fields and supports up to 100,000 Records at a time!
en.2020_december_additional_templates_descr: We've added new templates for onboarding new employees, reading lists, meeting notes, and user research
en.2020_december_built_in_gifs_description: Sometimes, the best way to communicate is with an animated cat :)
en.2020_december_improved_rickroll_descript: We've linked directly to 43 seconds into the video, because we're never gunna give you up
en.2020_november_built_in_support_descripti: You can now access our support team right within Blue. Our help widget automagically suggest relevant help guide content based on the feature you're on, and you can reach out to our team via live chat or email directly within Blue
en.2020_november_dark_mode_on_android_descr: Now our Android app supports dark mode. Sync it up with your phone settings or choose your always-on favorite theme
en.2020_november_improved_record_filter_int: We've significantly improved the interface for Record filtering, now you have one less click for all actions and you can see exactly what's filtered at a glance
en.2020_october_automations_description: Take your productivity to the next level by automating common actions. Create triggers based on actions like assigning people, moving Records, and setting due dates, and automatically take actions
en.2020_october_dark_mode_on_ios_descriptio: Now our iOS app supports dark mode. Sync it up with your phone settings or choose your always-on favorite theme
en.2020_september_project_templates_descrip: Whether you're hiring new people, kick starting sales, or planning an event, we've got a template to get you going to record time
en.2020_september_unread_mentions_filters_d: Now if you've got a lot of @mentions during the day, you can filters just by the ones you haven't read to stay on top of things
en.2020_august_grid_view_description: Now the default view on files has switched from a list to a grid, with built in preview of common files, and a handy button to switch back to list view as required!
en.2020_august_record_checklists_on_ios_and: Create checklists, assign people, and set a due date to checklist items right from your Blue app
en.2020_july_new_ios_app_description: Our iOS has had a new release that add lots of new functionality like archived projects, tags, Record history, and lots and lots of performance improvements. We've also updated the interface to bring it in line with Apple's latest interface guidelines
en.2020_july_new_android_app_description: Android has received some love with a new update that add lots of new features, improved offline support, and generally makes using an Android phone a pleasure :)
en.2020_june_improvements_to_web_app_descri: We've made significant performance improvements for our web app to cope with the increased usage across our customer base, and we've made the real-time data updates more... real-time!
en.2020_may_assignee_due_dates_on_checklist: Now, you have the ability to assign an individual checklist item to team members, and also set start and due dates! This is great for more granular project planning
en.2020_may_updated_dashboard_interface_des: Once you log into Blue, now you see a more organized and clean-looking dashboard that allows quick access to recent projects right on top, followed by your active companies, and inactive ones
en.2020_april_custom_fields_description: This new feature allows you to customize your Record fields. In addition to adding a due date or assignee to your Record, you can add specific fields for phone numbers, URLs, emails, currency, and more
en.2020_april_mention_page_description: This is your go-to place for all @mentions you get from comments, Records, updates, discussions, and across different projects and company
en.2020_april_dark_mode_description: You can now feel at ease when working at night or in the dark
en.2020_march_list_view_description: Adding to Boards and Calendar View, this new feature allows you to view your Records in a list format.  And you can check your Records off as you go, like checklists
en.2020_march_view_comment_only_description: You can now give people access to only view the details of a project or only comment
en.2020_march_change_user_access_level_desc: Before, you would have to remove the person and add them back in with the new access level. Now you can directly change their access level in People Management
en.2020_february_fullscreen_mode_descriptio: To limit the amount of distractions presented by the digital noise, you can now view your boards in Fullscreen and go into deep focus
en.2020_february_company_calendar_descripti: Before you could only turn on Calendar View for Projects, now you can see all that happens within your company across multiple projects in the Company Calendar. Big picture planning gets simple!
en.2020_february_performance_improvements_d: We've made Blue even faster and more reliable
en.2020_january_archive_projects_descriptio: Long list of projects on your workspace can be overwhelming; our new update gives you option to archive completed or projects you simply want to hide in the time being
en.2020_january_ability_to_leave_company_de: We've added a feature that allows you to remove yourself from a company. But don't forget to say bye!
en.2020_january_improved_board_ui_and_loadi: We've removed all shadows from Record cards and created a cleaner view of your workspace. Small changes in drag & drop shadows, loading views, and little touches this and there,  and voila... your new Blue work station!
en.2019_december_checklists_description: Sometimes a Record may come with other small tasks that need to be completed, and you can now add checklists inside to avoid missing small details
en.2019_december_android_app_description: Now Android users can enjoy the same benefits as iOS users. We have a new shiny app that has all the features you need, while giving a fast way to access Blue while on the go
en.2019_december_assignees_faces_on_cards_d: One glance is all it takes to see which members are assigned to a task, unless your members decide not to add their pictures, which is also fine
en.2019_december_improved_record_interface_: Nothing beats design that embraces simplicity; Blue's updated interface makes Records look more organized, and now you can move your Record across different columns through a dropdown option
en.2019_november_file_management_descriptio: Forget about Dropbox or Google Drive, you can now see all files uploaded in your project, and also store files separately from tasks and comments, as well as download multiple files at the same time
en.2019_november_date_ranges_for_records_de: Sometimes, Records don't just have a due date, but have a particular timeframe during which they need to be worked on. Now, you can set both start dates and due dates for Recordsl
en.2019_november_copy_move_records_descript: If you've ever needed to move or copy Records across projects...well you're in luck, because now you can!
en.2019_october_tags_description: If you track related but separate groups of tasks in one project, you'll now be able to color-code them and also filter them out to get a clearer overall picture
en.2019_october_emoji_support_description: Sometimes words are not enough, and that's why you can now search through Emojis to the find the perfect one to express what you want to say!
en.2019_october_bigger_maximum_file_size_de: We've now increased the maximum file size to 2GB, which is great for large design files, marketing videos, and more. Uploads are also even faster, and you can drag and drop anywhere on the browser to upload files
en.2019_october_per_project_notification_in: You'll now see a number next to each project on the sidebar, indicating how many new things have happened since you last checked
en.2019_october_resources_on_the_sidebar_de: We've added useful links to the sidebar to download our apps, learning videos, and more!
en.2019_october_sticky_toolbar_description: For those extra long comments or descriptions, the toolbar now sticks to the top of the screen so you always have the tools at your disposal
en.2019_september_calendars_description: Being able to view Records in a calendar format brings about lots of advantages, and it is perfect for things like editorial calendars, social media posting schedules, and more!
en.2019_september_record_history_descriptio: It's key to be able to see the full history of each Record, from when it was created, to which column it was moved to, to any name changes, due date changes, and more
en.2019_september_someone_is_writing_indica: It's annoying when you post a comment and someone immediately posts before or after you, and you cross the discussions and causes confusion. Now you can see if someone is writing at the same time as you are, so you can better judge when you should post
en.2019_september_mark_all_records_in_colum: Mark All Records in Column as Done
You can now mark an entire column on a board as done with two clicks. This is helpful when you've got a long list that's complete and you don't want to mark each item as done one by one
en.2019_september_discussion_list_improveme: We've made the discussion list much easier to navigate, especially if you have a large number of long discussions!
en.2019_august_beta_testing_website_descrip: You can now visit [https://beta.app.blue.cc](https://beta.app.blue.cc/) and login with your usual details to access all the upcoming features and give them a try!
en.2019_august_per_action_notification_sett: Choose which actions should give you notifications, so you can roll your own completed customizable notifications preferences
en.2019_august_someone_is_writing_indicator: It's annoying when you post a comment and someone immediately posts before or after you, and you cross the discussions and causes confusion. Now you can see if someone is writing at the same time as you are, so you can better judge when you should post
en.2019_august_search_inside_comments_descr: We've upgrade our already-powerful search engine to have the ability to search within any comments made on any Record, discussions, or update!
en.2019_august_leave_a_project_description: Yeah...we didn't have this before and you had to ask others to kick you out of a project. Now we do, and you can leave by yourself if you need!
en.2019_july_per_project_notifications_desc: Choose which projects should give you notifications, and which projects should stay quiet, so you can focus on what's important to you
en.2019_july_billing_description: We've got secure payments built right inside our app, as we like to get paid, you know ;)
en.2019_july_upgraded_design_description: We've upgraded Blue to the latest Material Design 2 guidelines
en.2019_july_speed_boost_description: Blue was already quite fast, but we've made it over 50% faster!
en.2019_july_drag_drop_projects_description: You're now able to reorder the projects in your sidebar to put the projects that are most important to you at the top of the list
en.2019_june_my_records_description: Keeping track of your responsibilities just got a whole lot easier! We now collect all your assigned Records across all your projects in one, so you can easily see what's on your plate
en.2019_june_real_time_search_description: Now you can search through all your Record, discussions, files, and updates from the top navigation bar. You'll never need to worry about where something was stored ever again
en.2019_june_auto_saving_drafts_description: Every message you write on our web or desktop applications now automatically save as you type, even if you close Blue and reopen it later. This ensures that you never lose anything mid-sentence!
en.2019_june_gallery_for_photos_description: Now when you click on a photo on a comment, you'll be presented the photo in a gallery view and you can browse through all the other photos in that Record or message
en.2019_june_offline_mode_for_ios_descripti: You can now use Blue on iOS while offline, and still see all your important data that you've previously looked at. That's great for long haul flights, or whenever the internet is not behaving itself ;)
en.2019_may_email_notifications_for_mention: When someone mentions you in a Record or comments, it normally means that it's quite important. Now we will email you to tell you to check out what was said
en.2019_may_play_videos_in_blue_description: Now when you upload a video file in Blue, we'll automatically turn that into a player so everyone can view the video without needing to download the file!
en.2019_may_emails_to_aws_ses_description: We're now sending emails from AWS SES, which means they are less likely to end up in your spam, and you should also see emails being delivered immediately
en.2019_may_upload_files_multiple_photos_on: Upload Files & Multiple Photos on iOS
We've built on top of the photo upload feature to add the ability to upload any file via iOS and also to select multiple photos and upload them all at the same time
en.2019_may_drag_and_drop_columns_on_ios_ti: Drag and Drop Columns on iOS
en.2019_may_drag_and_drop_columns_on_ios_de: Now you can move board columns around on iOS. Simply long press on a column and it will pop out, and you can drag and drop to reorder your processes or Record lists
en.2019_april_company_management_descriptio: Team management across the entire company, as well as the ability to upload your company logo and change company
en.2019_april_multi_language_description: Giving the ability for people to have Blue in their own native language! Khmer & Vietnamese are the first on the list
en.2019_april_increased_maximum_file_size_d: We've just increased the maximum allowed file size from 100mb to 500mb. Feel free to uploads those large schematics, videos, photo collections, and anything else you want
en.2019_april_upload_videos_on_ios_descript: You can now post videos into any discussions, comment, or Record directly via the iOS app
en.2019_april_date_filters_for_activity_des: We've added the ability to filter both the project and global activity by date, which is great if you want to know what happened at a particular point in time in a project
en.2019_march_pending_invitation_management: When you invite lots of new people to a project, it can be difficult to remember who's been invited when, and sometimes people lose the invitations. Now you easily manage any invitations that have been sent, including extending the invitation as well as cancelling it
en.2019_march_icons_for_most_common_file_ty: Icons for Most Common File Types

Blue comes with unlimited storage, so it's great to add all your different file types!  We now have custom icons for over 40 of the most common file types, so your files will look ever better once they're on Blue!
en.2019_march_ios_app_released_description: Now our iOS app is out of the beta and on the App Store for anyone to download
en.2019_march_browser_notifications_reminde: If you're wondering why you're not getting notifications, we now remind you to turn them on in your browsers so you can get the best from Blue (and your team!)
en.2019_february_realtime_keyword_filters_d: Now you can filters across all Records in a project by typing for the name, and we'll automatically hide all Records that don't match that search result
en.2019_february_mac_windows_app_descriptio: We've launched both the Mac and Windows applications. These can be installed via Google Chrome
en.2019_february_realtime_description: Anytime you do something, such as posting a new comment, it is instantly updated across both the web and mobile applications
en.2019_february_filter_completed_records_d: When a project has been going on for a while, it can fill up with old completed Records that you don't really need to see all the time. Now you can filter them away to keep things focussed
en.2019_january_self_sign_up_description: Now anyone with an email address can sign up to Blue, from anywhere in the world
en.2019_january_record_filters_sorting_desc: When you've got a lot of Records in a project it can get difficult to find things. Now you can filter by whether a Record has been completed, due dates within a date range, and also who's been assigned to the Record. And if you need to sort you Records, you can also do so!
en.2018_december_pretty_urls_description: Now all URLs are completely human readable and friendly to the eyes, which means that when you share a link with someone, they can instantly tell where that will lead
en.2018_december_performance_improvements_d: We took some time away from building new stuff to ensure that Blue stays as fast as ever
en.2018_november_automatic_30_day_backups_d: We now backup all data everyday for 30 days, so you can sleep well at night knowing everything is as safe as it can be
en.2018_november_notifications_v1_descripti: Both browser and mobile notifications for a whole different bunch of actions, so you can stay on top of your work
en.2018_october_project_and_global_activity: Each project now has a timeline of everything that has happened. Also, you can see a timeline of your entire company and see what's been going on across all your projects
en.2018_october_people_search_description: If a project has a large number of people, you'll now find that a handy real-time search bar appears to help you find who you're looking for in the People page :)
en.2018_september_team_management_descripti: Add and remove people from projects, and give them different permissions to ensure everyone can see and do what they need to!
en.2018_september_multiple_companies_descri: Now you can have the ability to switch between multiple companies, each with their own projects and people
en.2018_august_mentions_description: Need to give a teammate a heads up? Now you can by mentioning them in comments using @mentions! You'll automagically see a list of suggestions based on what you're typing and the people in the project
en.2018_august_file_uploads_description: We now support the uploading of files to any discussions/Record/comment. You get unlimited storage, with maximum file size of 100mb per file
en.2018_july_mobile_app_beta_description: We've released the beta versions of both Android and iOS mobile apps for our users to try. Being able to work on-the-go is important, as it stops you having to be stuck in the office!
en.2018_july_boards_description: Now you can track Records list across a board and build your own processes to keep everything in check. This is hands-down the best way to ensure that work keeps flowing in the right direction
en.2018_june_infinite_scroll_description: Nobody likes trying to remember what page something is on. With infinite scroll, we keep loading all your information for you as your scroll down the page
en.2018_june_status_updates_description: Keeping on top of what's going on is important. With status updates, you can see what others have been up to as well as post your own updates
en.2018_june_projects_description: Now you can create projects to keep things neat and tidy, and the cool thing is, each Blue accounts comes with an unlimited amount of projects!
en.2018_may_passwordless_sign_in_descriptio: We now support passwordless sign in for Blue. This is the safest way to login to an application as it doesn't require you to remember anything
en.2018_may_discussions_description: Now you can start and reply to discussions in Blue. Communication is the most important aspect of teamwork, and now you can do it right inside Blue
en.2018_april_start_description: We've started building Blue. We're excited at the possibility of helping people change the way they work for the better
